Things To Do And See:

The Sixth Floor Museum at Dealey Plaza

Neiman Marcus Downtown, the original Neiman Marcus

Dallas Museum of Art

Nasher Scuplture Center

Klyde Warren Park

Reunion Tower Geo Deck, see all of Dallas and Fort Worth from 470 feet up

McKinney Avenue Trolley

Perot Museum of Nature and Science

George W. Bush Library

Dallas Cowboy Stadium Tours

Highland Park Village

Northpark Shopping Center

PLACES TO DINE:

Lark on the Park, in the middle of Klyde Warren Park Downtown

Rosewood Mansion Restaurant and Bar, the cities oldest hotel

Fearing's Resturant in the Ritz Carlton Dallas, also for a drink visit the Rattlesnake Bar in the Ritz Carlton Dallas

El Fenix Downtown

Meso Maya Downtown

Twisted Root Burger, SMU

Hopdoddy Burgers, Luther Lane

Stampede 66

The Rustic

Zodiac Room

Savor

Velvet Taco
